_source.text: Advocates for climate cap-and-trade legislation couldn't get it any better than this, what with stronger Democratic majorities on both ends of Capitol Hill and President-elect Barack Obama a week away from taking office.

text: Advocates for **climate** cap-and-trade legislation couldn't get it any **better** **than** this, what with
stronger Democratic majorities on both **ends** of Capitol Hill and President-elect Barack Obama **a** week away from taking office.
